scripts.run: parcel build client/index.html --no-minify --no-cache --no-source-maps && node util.js && clasp push && xdg-open https://script.google.com/macros/s/1UXDFEQp5Xoirpj5Dvln_Pk0WAX_NZ8d_XppDCV_3cgsFODUkJ1uCo_fz/
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch client --watch server --exec "npm run run" --ext js,html,scss,css
